description: A small indian girl with colorful scarf around her neck, big braids, sitting on the floor, with crayons and drawing on a big sheet of paper in front of her. A woman is standing behind her watching her
text:
Woman: What are you drawing, sweetie?
Girl: I'm drawing my family.

description: A small indian girl with colorful scarf around her neck, big braids, sitting on the floor, with crayons and drawing on a big sheet of paper in front of her. A woman is standing behind her watching her, smiling
text:
Woman: That's beautiful, honey.
Girl: Thank you.

description: A small indian girl with colorful scarf around her neck, big braids, sitting on the floor, with crayons and drawing on a big sheet of paper in front of her. A woman is standing behind her, pointing at the drawing
text:
Woman: Is this your mom?
Girl: Yes.

description: A small indian girl with colorful scarf around her neck, big braids, sitting on the floor, with crayons and drawing on a big sheet of paper in front of her. A woman is standing behind her, pointing at the drawing
text:
Girl: And this is my dad.
Woman: They look very happy.

description: A small indian girl with colorful scarf around her neck, big braids, sitting on the floor, with crayons and drawing on a big sheet of paper in front of her. A woman is standing behind her watching her, smiling
text:
Woman: I'm so proud of you.
Girl: Thank you.
